title: Bicycle accessory maker launches AirTag tire holder, but is that a good thing?
content:
Muc-Off, an English bicycle accessory maker, has created a holder for Apple’s AirTag that fits into a bicycle tire. Called the Stealth Tubeless Tag Holder, an AirTag can now go inside the rim of a mountain or gravel bike tire.

more…
